description: '''Latin pop''' ({{langx|es|pop latino}}) is a [[pop music]] subgenre that is a fusion of USâ€“style [[music production]] with [[Latin music]] genres from anywhere in [[Latin America]] and [[Spain]]. It originates with [[List of countries where Spanish is an official language|Spanish-speaking]] musicians. Generally, Latin pop refers to pop music in Spanish and is commonly associated with Spanish-language pop, rock, and dance music.
